name: Fish Go - io game
description:
Source code and tutorials:

A  Html5 Webgl game built with  Cocos Creator: https://www.cocos.com/en/creator

Game is well optimized and can be loaded instantly and even run smoothly on low-end device browsers.

Source code can be used to released on Facebook Instant Game or any web game portal.

If you buy the source code and have issue playing with it, you can always request support for your issue through the comment area or contact me by email. Please make sure to describe the problem you encounter as detailed as possible so I will have all the information to help you out best.

Test the source code:

Refer to this Youtube tutorial for how to test the HTML5 game with the local server.

(Quick and easy local server setup using Visual Studio Code and the free Live Server extension.)
